about.me: Hi, I'm Matt - the WILD pool operator. I am based in the UK and have over 10 years experience with I.T systems and networking. WILD is a professionally run stake pool and was created to combine two of my big passions - Cardano and Wildlife conservation. The aim of WILD is to contribute towards helping protect our precious wildlife and their habitats. Appreciate your consideration into staking at WILD. Thank you!
